name: Shikhar Gupta

company.name: Upcomming SDE intern at American Express (former SDE @Nasdaq)

description:
I am Shikhar Gupta, a dedicated and innovative Software Engineer with extensive experience in full-stack development. Currently pursuing an Integrated Master's degree in Information Technology at IIIT Gwalior, I have honed my skills in a variety of programming languages, including C/C++, JavaScript, TypeScript, Python, and Java, achieving a CGPA of 7.02.
My technical proficiency encompasses modern tools and frameworks such as React.js, Next.js, Node.js, Express.js, GraphQL, and Docker. I excel in designing and deploying scalable, high-performance web applications, leveraging cutting-edge technologies like serverless architecture and server-side caching. Additionally, I have a deep understanding of SEO optimization, including the use of generative AI, to enhance system performance and drive user engagement.
I am passionate about creating intuitive, user-friendly interfaces that deliver exceptional user experiences.With a proven ability to build solutions that are both efficient and impactful, my projects reflect my passion for innovation and my commitment to improving functionality and optimizing user experience.
note: Seeking for open source project collobrations and internships.
